actions.text: Referred to House Committee on The Judiciary.
Referred to Subcommittee on Administrative Law and Governmental Relations.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Administrative Law and Governmental Relations

official_title: A bill for the relief of LeRoy Sylestine, Chairman of the Tribal Council of the Coushatta Tribe of Louisiana, and all other enrolled members of the Coushatta Tribe of Louisiana.

summary.text: Authorizes and directs the Secretary of the Treasury to pay a sum to a named individual and all other enrolled members of a Louisiana Indian tribe in settlement of all claims arising from the uncompensated taking by the United States of land owned or occupied by the tribe in the 19th century.

titles.title: A bill for the relief of LeRoy Sylestine, Chairman of the Tribal Council of the Coushatta Tribe of Louisiana, and all other enrolled members of the Coushatta Tribe of Louisiana.
